name: 2018 Artificial Intelligence and Cloud Computing Conference (AICCC 2018) EI Compendex, Scopus
content: Conference official website：http://www.aiccc.net Meeting time：December 21-23, 2018\. Meeting place：Tokyo, Japan. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Kaoru HIROTA - Tokyo Institute of Technology, Japan. Japan Society for the Promotion of Science Beijing Office, China. Beijing Institute of Technology, China. Prof. Seiichi Ozawa - Center for Mathematical and Data Sciences,Kobe University, Japan. Prof. Chiharu Ishii - Department of Mechanical Engineering, Faculty of Science and Engineering, Hosei University, Japan. Published by： Accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec etc. Call for Papers： Information Retrieval. Intelligent System Architectures. Knowledge Representation. Knowledge-based Systems. Mechatronics. Multimedia & Cognitive Informatics. Neural Networks. Parallel Processing. Pattern Recognition. Cloud as a Service. Cloud Infrastructure. Cloud Management. Cloud Security. Cloud Computing Technologies. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : August 15, 2018\. Deadline (abstract) : Septemder 05, 2018\. Registration Deadline: Septemder 25, 2018\. Conference Contact :Mr. Victor Chang. mailbox: aiccc.contact@gmail.com Tel: +86-021-59561560.
